T02D1520:38a-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra sto ttra n'a ma /
T02D1520:38a-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1520:38a-4: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1520:38b-0: h'um chos nyid dbyings las @38b bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni //
T02D1520:38b-1: nyon mongs rnam dag ye shes sku brnyes shing //
T02D1520:38b-2: dus mtha'i me dpung lta bu'i klong dkyil nas //
T02D1520:38b-3: ri rab chu skyes nyi ma'i gdan steng na //
T02D1520:38b-4: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpa' bo chen po'i sku //
T02D1520:38b-5: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan sku mdog mthing ga mkha' ltar dag pa'i 'od //
T02D1520:38b-6: gcer bu glang chen stag gi sham thabs can //
T02D1520:38b-7: zhal gdangs tshems gtsigs h'um gi 'brug sgra sgrogs //
T02D1520:38b-8: dpral ba'i khro gnyer spyan gsum glog ltar 'khyug / ral pa'i thor tshugs zla phyed rdo rje dang //
T02D1520:38b-9: thod pa nor bu mi bskyod rtags kyis mdzes //
T02D1520:38b-10: sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba dang //
T02D1520:38b-11: rgod dang gshe dang rngam pa'i ngad tshul can //
T02D1520:38b-12: snying rje zhi dang rmad du byung ba'i nyams //
T02D1520:38b-13: gar gyi rnam 'phrul nam mkha' khyab par ston //
T02D1520:38b-14: 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan gdub skor dang //
T02D1520:38b-15: ske rags thal chen tshangs pa'i skud pa can //
T02D1520:38b-16: mi mgo'i do shal rdo rje dril bu 'khyud //
T02D1520:38b-17: dpal ldan he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1520:38b-18: gnyis med tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das ma yang //
T02D1520:38b-19: sku mdog dmar mo gcer bu skra grol zhing //
T02D1520:38b-20: phyag rgya lnga dang rdo rje thod pa 'khyud //
T02D1520:38b-21: phung po khams dang skye mched rang bzhin la //
T02D1520:38b-22: ma lus rgyal ba'i rigs rnams yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1520:38b-23: srid pa rnam dag sku yi yan lag la //
T02D1520:38b-24: nyi shu rtsa bzhi yul gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1520:38b-25: khyod ni khams kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo dang //
T02D1520:38b-26: rtsa yi rang bzhin dpa' mo nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1520:38b-27: bye ba'i grangs snyed ma lus 'khor bcas kun //
T02D1520:38b-28: gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang nye zhing sogs //
T02D1520:38b-29: sa bcu'i gnas su gnyis med dgyes par rol //
T02D1520:38b-30: bde chen longs spyod rdzogs la rnam rol zhing //
T02D1520:38b-31: rnam dag skye mched las kyang 'khor lo bzhi //
T02D1520:38b-32: lus kyi rnam dag rang bzhin gzhal yas khang //
T02D1520:38b-33: rnam shes brgyad las sprul ba'i dur khrod brgyad //
T02D1520:38b-34: dngos dang dngos min rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1520:38b-35: kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1520:38b-36: ma lus gcig tu 'dus pa'i skur gyur pa //
T02D1520:38b-37: dpal ldan khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1520:38b-38: khyod kyi 'od zer glog tsam mthong ba las //
T02D1520:39a-2: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba ma lus kun //
T02D1520:39a-3: mgon po khyod kyis thugs rjes gzung du gsol //
T02D1520:39a-4: dam tshig brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02D1520:39a-5: brtse ba'i thugs kyis bu bzhin dgongs nas kyang //
T02D1520:39a-6: bar chad bdud dpung zhi bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D1520:39a-7: dur khrod la sogs gnas su srog dor nas //
T02D1520:39a-8: khyod kyi rnal 'byor rtag tu brtson pa la //
T02D1520:39a-9: ye shes yar ngo'i zla ltar 'phel ba dang //
T02D1520:39a-10: dngos grub tshul bzhin 'grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1520:39a-11: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02D1520:39a-12: mkhyen pa nyi 'od lta bur rab rgyas te //
T02D1520:39a-13: yon tan gzi brjid chen po bskyed du gsol /
T02D1520:39a-14: mtha' khob kla klo'i gnas su 'khyams pa dang //
T02D1520:39a-15: log rtog bdung kyis bcings pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D1520:39a-16: khyod kyi rnams sprul mthong thos dran bas kyang //
T02D1520:39a-17: mgon po khyod kyis gdul byar gzung du gsol //
